sentences.sContent: Fans blasted his music and danced energetically to the delight of tourists and passers-by on the crowded footpath.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fans blasted his music and danced energetically to the delight of tourists and passers-by on the crowded footpath.
sentences.sCn: 在这条拥挤的人行道上，歌迷们向兴致盎然的游客和路人播放着杰克逊的音乐，并随之跳起劲舞。

trans.tranOther: a narrow path for people to walk along, especially in the country
